pages.Posterior.post_router(dd_vals, b_e, op_s, e_var, e_in, q_var, e_op, op_i)

Receives callback events and manages these to the correct

Parameters

  • dd_vals – All Varietals used in Evidence Section are chosen

  • b_e – Trigger if the Zoom Button in the Evidence is Pressed

  • op_s – Trigger if the Modal parameter from a Zoom should be saved

  • e_var – the Dropdown of variable of Evidence Section

  • e_in – the Input for the Variables of Evidence Section

  • q_var – the Dropdown of variable of Query Section

  • e_op – Information of whiche Zoom Button was pressed in the Evidence section

  • op_i – The Values choosen in the Zoom Modal

Returns

returns evidence variable, evidence Input, text prefix, query Variable

pages.Posterior.modal_router(op, op_i, m_bod, dd)

Recessive all App Calls that are change the Modal for the zoom Function

Parameters

  • op – Trigger to add More Input Option by Numeric Variabel

  • op_i – Trigger to update Chance for the Chosen values

  • m_bod – The State of the Modal

  • dd – div withe the chosen values

Returns

update Modal Body for the Zoom

pages.Posterior.erg_controller(n1, n2, n3, e_var, e_in, q_var)

Conntroller for the Results and the Displays

Parameters

  • n1 – event for generating Result

  • n2 – the Previous Result

  • n3 – the Next Result

  • e_var – the Dropdown of variable of Evidence Section

  • e_in – the Input for the Variables of Evidence Section

  • q_var – the Dropdown of variable of Query Section

Returns

Returns the Name of The Variabel, the plot of the Variable, if there is a pre or post result

pages.Posterior.plot_post(vars: List, n: int)

Generates the Plots for a Varibel in Vars postion n

Parameters

  • vars – List of Variabel

  • n – Postion of the Choosen Variabel

Returns

Plot
